mapper.select: select a.id,a.createTime,a.shelvesId from (select id,create_time createTime,shelves_id shelvesId from warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl where status = 1 group by shelvesId) a where not exists (select 1 from (select id,create_time createTime,shelves_id shelvesId from warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl where status = 1 group by shelvesId) b b.shelvesId = a.shelvesId and b.createTime > a.createTime )

select id, shelves_id shelvesId, shelves_line shelvesLine, shelves_column shelvesColumn, shelves_type shelvesType, length, width, height, maximum_weight maximumWeight, category_upper_limit categoryUpperLimit,w.name,w.code,wa.area_name areaName,wa.area_code areaCode from warehouse_area_shelves_location wasl left join warehouse_area_shelves was on wasl.shelves_id = was.id left join warehouse_area wa on wa.`id` = was.`area_id` left join warehouse w on w.`id` = wa.`warehouse_id` where status = 1 and wasl.shelves_id = #{form.shelvesId} order by create_time desc
